function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Hospital-acquired COVID-19 due to airborne transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of infection among patients and staff","Mitigation":"Implementation of air filtration and UV sterilization","Technologies":"Air filtration and UV sterilization devices","People":"Patients, hospital staff","Owner":"Hospital management"},{"Description":"Presence of other microbial bioaerosols","Impact":"Increased risk of infection from other pathogens","Mitigation":"Implementation of air filtration and UV sterilization","Technologies":"Air filtration and UV sterilization devices","People":"Patients, hospital staff","Owner":"Hospital management"}]}
